#include<iostream>
#include<string.h>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
getchar();

char strng[100005];
while(t--)
{

    int cnt = 0;

    gets(strng);
    int p=strlen(strng)-1;

    for(int i=0;i<p;i++)
        {if(strng[i]=='0'&&strng[i+1]=='1')
             cnt++;

    }

cout<<cnt<<endl;


}





return 0;}
